plot: Semi-retired Moscow detective, Somov, is hired as a consultant on various LAPD investigations involving the Russian-Los Angeles community.
plot_en: Semi-retired Moscow detective, Somov, is hired as a consultant on various LAPD investigations involving the Russian-Los Angeles community.
plot_es: Semi-retired Moscow detective, Somov, is hired as a consultant on various LAPD investigations involving the Russian-Los Angeles community.
title: Russkie v Gorode Angelov
